showTitles: Re:ゼロから始める異世界生活
charNames: ロズワール・Ｌ・メイザース

name.native: ロズワール・Ｌ・メイザース

character.description:
The lord of the Roswaal Mansion and a descendant of the original Roswaal.

~!It is later revealed that he is in fact the original Roswaal, Roswaal A. Mathers, who has been possessing his descendants' bodies.!~
